thread.title: BRIEF-Chevron's Former CEO John Watson's 2017 Total Compensation Was $24.8 Mln Vs $24.7 Mln In 2016

title: BRIEF-Chevron's Former CEO John Watson's 2017 Total Compensation Was $24.8 Mln Vs $24.7 Mln In 2016
text:
April 10, 2018 / 7:29 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Chevron's Former CEO John Watson's 2017 Total Compensation Was $24.8 Mln Vs $24.7 Mln In 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Chevron Corp: 
* CHEVRON CORP SAYS FORMER CEO JOHN WATSON’S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $24.8 MLN VS $24.7 MLN IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING 
* CHEVRON CORP SAYS CFO PATRICIA YARRINGTON’S TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR 2017 WAS $8.2 MLN VS $6.5 MLN LAST YEAR - SEC FILING 
* CHEVRON CORP SAYS MICHAEL WIRTH'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $11.7 MILLION VERSUS $9.1 MILLION IN FY 2016 Source text ( bit.ly/2qnhiLq ) Further company coverage:
